about.softFast: Passionate about learning, also a very fast learner
about.softTeam: Experienced in working in cross-disciplinary teams
about.softComm: My background in audiovisual production and creative coding lets communicate easily with all professional roles within a team, be it a technician, a designer or an artist
about.softLang: Italian native speaker, fluent in English, currently learning Catalan for no specific reason other than it' fun

mrwolfa.intr1: A Telegram Bot made in Node.js that can answer questions asked by users, covering many topics such as mathematics, physics, history, culture, nutrition and many more.
mrwolfa.intr2: Answer computing leverages the power of Wolfram|Alpha computational knowledge engine API.
mrwolfa.intr3: It can provide answers either by text or vocal message thanks to Google Cloud Text-to-Speech API.
